content: Just to raise visibility, I've written a copule of interesting markdown docs on hackmd, see https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/frontend.20library-ification/near/185224466
In https://hackmd.io/XoQrzR8GRLa64jpjylQ7Bw you say You can also use the similar trick to store a `SyntaxNode` [...] instead of storing a `GreenNode` . Did you mean GreenNode the first time too?
Nope, that's what I meant. I've exploded that sentence into four, to make it clearer :sweat_smile:
